text: Ceroplesis buettneri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Kolbe in 1863. It is known from Benin, Ghana, the Ivory Coast, and Togo.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis buettneri. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1863
title: Ceroplesis buettneri
